column5: Register your interest in graduate study at University of KentThe Computer Science (Artificial Intelligence) course focuses on how computer science and artificial intelligence can solve complex problems in the world. This is a rapidly evolving field for the transformation of our society from self-driving cars, robotics, finance and healthcare.This is a conversion course intended for graduates with little or no prior knowledge of computer science.
